Install¶

pip install blobster

How to use¶

Import¶

from blobster import *

Loading credentials¶

python azure_blob_storage = AzureBlobStorage(account='your_account_string', key='your_key_string')

Connnect to Azure Blob Storage¶

python azure_blob_storage.connect()
